summary:
With over 20 years of experience I have a lot to offer.

I have worked in many working environments from a pure nerdy IT environment to the highly competitive Commercial Business Banking environment. But also in the health environment, social benefits/ social insurance sector, university and education sector.  All of this combining in an  international setting, a private sector setting or a government  setting.

As for skill set you can expect profound experience in developing, building and deploying highly interactive database related solutions. I have built Management Information Systems (MIS), Financial Tracking Information Systems, Health Procurement Systems, Education Management Information Systems (EMIS),  Communicable Disease Tracking System, Data Dictionary Systems (DDS)  and more.

Although most of my experience is related to the Microsoft development techniques such as C#, VB.Net, ASP.Net, SharePoint, SQL Server and more I also used Oracle, Android, MySQL, PhP and other open source tools. I started as a Cobol expert and from there I kept pace with the transforming  IT landscape.  I have the ability to pick-up relevant techniques quickly and adapt skills according what is needed. 

Besides these technical skills I have acquired experience in many other areas. To mention a few Project management, Curriculum Writing, TVET training, Presentation Skills, System Analyse and Design, Research, Statistical Evaluation, Procurement and Tender processes, Financial and Budget Management, Training and Coaching and more.
